title: Ticket #1366: Update logging to include times on stale lock file detection.
description:
We have witnessed some ("Stale lock") oddities across an NFS share which causes an HA fail-over even though the main schedd is still alive and well.

The oddity is that the expiration time should not have been hit...
attachments:
• Ticket1366.patch 1530 bytes added by tstclair on 2010-Apr-20 18:25:43 UTC.
    Mods to lock file handling & logging
check_ins: 2010-Apr-20 14:40   Check-in [17887]: Ticket #1366 - Update error handling and logging on stale lock file detection It will now output the times. (By Timothy St. Clair )
